answers.answer: Did you bang it or bruise it at any point? If so that would likely be the cause of its falling off. If not, then I wouldn't worry greatly, not enough for the hospital, but I would have your doctor take a look at it as we need to be careful with our feet.
Go see a podiatrist.  You should be seeing one on a regular basis anyway if you are diabetic.

question: i have lost part of my big toe nail. i  am wondering if that has anything to do with my diabetes. should i go to the hospital to have it checked out
title: diabetes
